癙字的基本解释

癙
shǔ
忧郁病：“癙忧以痒。”
瘘疮：“（脱扈之山）有草焉……名曰植楮，可以已癙。”

癙字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shǔ］
［《廣韻》舒吕切，上語，書。］
(1)忧郁；郁闷成病。
(2)瘘管。

癙字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【疒字部】　癙； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页781第32
【廣韻】舒呂切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】賞呂切，?音暑。【集韻】憂病也。通作鼠。【爾雅·釋詁】癙，病也。【詩·小雅】癙憂以痒。傳：癙，病也。【註】呂氏曰：鼠憂，幽也。劉氏曰：鼠病而憂在于穴內，所不知。范氏曰：凡物之多畏者，惟鼠爲甚，故謂癙憂。　又屚創也。【淮南子·說山訓】貍頭療癙。　又【集韻】商署切，音恕。義同。

癙字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
癙字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
hidden
shǔ
Melancholic disease: "Itching makes me sorrowful."
Fistula: "(The mountain of escape) there is Caoyan... the name is Zhichu, it can be cured."
hidden
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [shǔ]
["Guangyun" Shu Lvqie, Shangyu, book. ]
(1) Melancholy; depressed and sick.
(2) Fistula.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Concentration] [Department of Sui Characters] 　癙; Kangxi strokes: 18;
[Guang Yun] Shu Lv Che [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun] Appreciating Lv Che, sound summer. [Ji Yun] Worry about illness. Pass as a rat. 【Erya·Shi Gu】Hyper, sickness. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】Itching with worry. Biography: Diseases, illnesses too. [Note] Lu said: Rat worry, quiet. Liu said: Rats are sick and worry in the acupoints, and I don't know them. Fan said: The fear of all things, but the mouse is the worst, so it is called sorrow.　屚Chuangye again. 【Huainanzi·Said Mountain Training】The raccoon head cures the disease.　 [Ji Yun] The Commercial Office cuts, the sound is forgiving. The same meaning.
